title: Hakuouki Sekkaroku
title_english: Hakuoki ~Demon of the Fleeting Blossom~ A Memory of Snow Flowers
synopsis: This OVA takes place in between episodes 8 and 9 of the first season of Hakuouki. Yukimura Chizuru goes on a reconnaissance mission in Shimabara as a geiko for the Shinsengumi. Each episode unfolds the events of the days leading up to, during, and after the operation. It intermittently reveals each captain's involvement as well as that of a few demons in the affair. Each individual episode primarily focuses from the third person perspectives of: Okita Souji, Saito Hajime, Harada Sanosuke, Toudou Heisuke, Hijikata Toshizo, and Kazama Chikage.
opening_themes: "Yume no Ukifune (夢ノ浮舟)" by Aika Yoshioka
ending_themes: #1: "Mugen - a true love tale- (夢幻 -a true love tale-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 1)
#2: "Kazahana -The whisper of snow falling- (風花 -The whisper of snow falling-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 2)
#3: "Ran -The end of struggle- (蘭 -The end of struggle-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 3)
#4: "Hikari -I promise you- (光 -I promise you-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 4)
#5: "Shinjitsu -The light lasting- (真実 -The light lasting-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 5)
#6: "Hiyoku -Contract with you- (比翼-Contract with you-)" by Maon Kurosaki (ep 6)
